programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean are alarmed when they learn hunters are being killed by suspicious 'accidents' all over the country. They decide it is best to find Mary and make sure she's safe.Guests: Samantha Smith, Elizabeth Blackmore..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Caught in a dangerous situation, Sam and Dean only have each other to rely on. Meanwhile, the fight between the American Hunters and the British Hunters comes to a head.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Lucifer battles Sam, Dean and Castiel for control of his unborn child.

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.desc: When Henry's parolee, Nick, crashes his car into a bank after being denied a loan, Paige and Billie must come up with a non-magical solution. Elsewhere, Piper and Phoebe have their hands full when Wyatt uses his magic to make his toys come to life.

programme.desc: A monk teaches Billie how to harness her power of projection to find her sister. Elsewhere, Phoebe throws a housewarming party that gets out of control and Paige introduces Henry to the world of magic by taking him on an 'orb-along.'.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a man impersonating Lasalle attempts to free a young woman from jail, the team investigates both the imposter and the prisoner. Also, Pride’s daughter pays him a surprise visit.

programme.desc: When Sebastian is injured while unsuccessfully trying to prevent a kidnapping, NCIS races to find the missing woman and her abductors.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Trace the rise of Dennis Rodman from an at times homeless teenage airport janitor to a star at Southeastern Oklahoma State, in the NBA and beyond.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Explores the story of WNBA superstar and activist Maya Moore, who was one of the best basketball players in the world when she stepped away from the sport for a remarkable reason: to fight for a man she believed was wrongly imprisoned.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: These 30 documentaries explore great sports events of the last 30 years.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is whisked away to Europe when her boyfriend reveals he's actually a prince.

programme.title: Sugar Plum Twist
programme.desc: A professional ballerina returns home for Christmas, where she works with a student with a flair for Latin dance.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to be Merry
programme.desc: A woman travels to snow-covered Vermont in order to find a fresh angle for her book about relationships. With the help of a charismatic aid work, he begins to find a new perspective and some holiday cheer.

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A single mother who's lost all interest in Christmas finds just what she needs when her uncle comes to visit.

programme.title: A Very Merry Bridesmaid
programme.desc: A woman's 30th birthday falls on Christmas Eve, the same day that her brother is getting married. Her childhood crush returns to town for the wedding, and wants to ensure that her birthday is properly celebrated.

programme.title: Eight Gifts of Hanukkah
programme.desc: Sara receives a gift from an anonymous suiter for each night of Hanukkah. In her quest to discover her secret admirer, she learns that her true love may be someone she never would have expected.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Promise
programme.desc: Two strangers who share a disdain for Christmas navigate their holiday complications together by creating The Mistletoe Promise. As they spend more time with each other, they discover there may be more to their contract.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: At Christmas, a cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical VP and his eclectic team to help a charity in need.

programme.title: Jingle Around the Clock
programme.desc: A woman plans a Christmas to remember with her college friends, only to be thwarted by an opportunity she can't pass up. Much to her surprise, she is forced to team up with a man who has a completely different view of what Christmas really means.

programme.title: Making Spirits Bright
programme.desc: The son and daughter of rivalling holiday families help to mend their fathers' long-running feud, compete in the town's holiday decorating contest, and find romance along the way.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman is planning the town's Christmas celebration and must win over a firefighter in order to obtain his beautiful spruce for the tree lighting.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two NYC-bound travellers find themselves linked when a storm waylays their flight to an airport hotel in Buffalo. Desperate to get home in time for Christmas, a woman seeks help, in any form, to make a Christmas miracle happen.

programme.title: Sister Swap: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: Two sisters decide to swap cities in order to pursue new projects for the twelve days leading up to Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas House 2: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: A man expects a calm Christmas, but is unexpectedly roped into a house decorating TV show, where he is pitted against his brother.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: Former classmates find themselves travelling home together for the holidays. When a storm hits, they must work together to each get to their destination.

programme.title: My Christmas Love
programme.desc: A hopeless romantic who can't seem to give a guy a real chance begins receiving '12 Days of Christmas' gifts anonymously at door. She begins to believe that the mystery suitor could live up to her expectations.

programme.title: Sister Swap: A Hometown Holiday
programme.desc: Two sisters decide to swap cities in order to pursue new projects for the 12 days leading up to Christmas.

programme.title: Sleigh Bells Ring
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman struggles to get into the holiday spirit while heading up her hometown parade. With the help of a Christmas sleigh and a handsome woodworker, she is destined to turn her luck around.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: A woman has big hopes for her town's big holiday adventure, until she meets the man behind the plan.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: As her wedding approaches, a woman steps up to help launch a new museum, all while questioning if marrying her fiancé is the right choice.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is hired to become a personal shopper for an uptight, corporate executive. As they work together, she teaches him that Christmas has less to do with the money that is spent, and more to do with the people in your life.

programme.title: The Christmas House
programme.desc: When a TV star's parents ask him to bring back a revered family tradition, he revisits the family's traditions and brings back the magic of Christmases past.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Santa grants a wish for a woman and she gets a chance to prove herself to her boss. Santa's wish only gives her 48 hours and as the clock ticks down, she channels the Christmas magic and speaks her mind all on her own.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: A handsome bachelor sees his life change before his eyes when he adopts a stray cat.
